thread.title: CBS orders 22-episode, full season of 'Limitless'
thread.title_full: CBS orders 22-episode, full season of 'Limitless' - UPI.com

author: Karen Butler
title: CBS orders 22-episode, full season of 'Limitless'
text:
| License Photo LOS ANGELES, Oct. 24 (UPI) -- There is no end in sight for the freshman drama Limitless .
CBS announced it has given a full-season, 22-episode order to the sci-fi series.
"We're excited how Limitless continues to evolve creatively each week and stand out with its unique style of storytelling," Glenn Geller, president of CBS Entertainment, said in a statement Friday. "It's off to a strong start in a highly competitive environment."
The series stars Jake McDorman, Jennifer Carpenter, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio and Hill Harper.
Bradley Cooper , the show's executive producer, will guest star on Tuesday's episode. Cooper appeared in the series premiere as the politician who provided McDorman's Brian Finch character "with a temporary inoculation from the severe side effects of the brain-enhancing drug NZT, and hinted he had future plans for Brian," a synopsis said. "In the upcoming episode, as Brian's physical and mental health begin to deteriorate again, Morra demands a high price in exchange for another inoculation."
Cooper originated the character of Edward "Eddie" Morra in the 2011 movie version of Limitless . In the film, Morra was a struggling writer who unlocks his brain's full potential when he takes NZT.
